arrow-proof.name: Arrow-Proof
arrow-proof.description: Ignore the first hit dealing injury from arrows that you suffer in a scene.

blunted.name: Blunted
blunted.description: This weapon inflicts exhaustion, not injury.

bulky.name: Bulky
bulky.description: This weapon cannot be hidden and is always visible while on your body. Mark exhaustion whenever you attempt a roguish feat or trust fate to sneak, hide, blindside, or perform an act of acrobatics. (Large weapons)

ceremonial.name: Ceremonial
ceremonial.description: Choose an attached faction. While this item is displayed, treat yourself as having +1 Reputation with that faction, and -1 Reputation with other factions.

comfortable.name: Comfortable
comfortable.description: This item counts as 1 fewer Load.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: Mark one exhaustion when you don your armor—clear one exhaustion when you take it off.

eaglecraft.name: Eaglecraft
eaglecraft.description: Mark wear when engaging in melee to both make and suffer another exchange of harm.

fast.name: Fast
fast.description: Mark wear when engaging in melee to suffer 1 fewer harm, even on a miss.

friendly.name: Friendly
friendly.description: When you meet someone important, mark exhaustion to roll with your Reputation +1.

flexible.name: Flexible
flexible.description: When you grapple with someone, mark exhaustion to ignore the first choice they make.

foxfolk-steel.name: Foxfolk Steel
foxfolk-steel.description: Ignore the first box of wear you mark on this item each session.

hair-trigger.name: Hair Trigger
hair-trigger.description: Mark wear to target a vulnerable foe at close range instead of far.

healers-kit.name: Healer's Kit
healers-kit.description: Mark wear to clear exhaustion. Mark 2-wear to clear injury.

heavy-bludgeon.name: Heavy Bludgeon
heavy-bludgeon.description: Mark exhaustion to to ignore your enemy’s armor when you inflict harm.

heavy-draw-weight.name: Heavy Draw Weight
heavy-draw-weight.description: When you target a vulnerable foe with this bow, mark exhaustion to inflict 1 additional injury.

iron-bolts.name: Iron Bolts
iron-bolts.description: This weapon inflicts 1 additional wear when its harm is absorbed by armor.

large.name: Large
large.description: Mark exhaustion when inflicting harm with this weapon to inflict 1 additional harm.

luxury.name: Luxury
luxury.description: After creation, this item is worth +3 Value.

mousefolk-steel.name: Mousefolk Steel
mousefolk-steel.description: Mark wear to engage in melee using Cunning instead of Might.

oiled-string.name: Oiled String
oiled-string.description: Mark wear to use the weapon skill quick shot even if you don’t have it.

quick.name: Quick
quick.description: Mark exhaustion to engage in melee with Finesse instead of Might.

rabbitfolk-steel.name: Rabbitfolk Steel
rabbitfolk-steel.description: Mark wear to engage in melee with Finesse instead of Might.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: When you engage in melee, mark wear on this weapon to inflict harm instead of trading harm; you cannot use this tag if your enemy’s weapon also has reach.

sharp.name: Sharp
sharp.description: Mark wear when inflicting harm with this weapon to inflict 1 additional harm.

short-limbs.name: Short Limbs
short-limbs.description: Mark wear to fire a quick shot at far range.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: When you engage in melee with this weapon, choose one fewer option. Mark wear to ignore this effect.

thick.name: Thick
thick.description: When you mark wear on this shield to block a hit, you only ever mark 1-wear, even if you are blocking more harm from a single hit.

throwable.name: Throwable
throwable.description: Mark exhaustion to target a vulnerable foe with this weapon at far range.

tightly-woven.name: Tightly Woven
tightly-woven.description: When you take a few seconds to repair this armor after a fight, clear 1-wear you marked during the fight.

tricky.name: Tricky
tricky.description: When you use this item to trick an NPC by distracting them at a distance, on a 7-9 mark wear to eliminate one option from the trick an NPC move before the NPC picks.

unassuming.name: Unassuming
unassuming.description: Until you harm an enemy, they will never deem you more of a threat than other vagabonds with arms and armor.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.description: When you move to or from a range this weapon can reach, mark wear to make a quick strike and inflict 1-injury on any opponent in this weapon’s range.

weighty.name: Weighty
weighty.description: This item counts as 1 additional Load.
